channel.title: SONY A7IV on Nathan Obert
channel.description: Recent content in SONY A7IV on Nathan Obert

item.title: Haida Installation on Sony FE 1.7 / 14 GM
item.description: Introduction What are ND Filters & Haida Installation on Sony FE 1.7 / 14 GM. Today we first explain what ND filters are, how they can be used. We tackle how to install ND Filters, and finally we will install a rear Haida ND filter on the Sony FE 1.7 / 14 GM Lens. Video

item.title: How to stream video using Sony A7IV
item.description: Introduction How to stream video using Sony A7IV. I provide instructions on how to setup Live Streaming with the Sony A7IV on Mac and Windows. Video

item.title: Sony FE 1.8 / 14 GM Lens Review
item.description: Introduction Review of Photography with the Sony FE 1.8 / 14 GM Lens, using Sony A7IV. Video
